Investigate the Beach Walkthrough

The Seclude Clove of the beach can be located near the Sacred Pool in the Emerald Grove (X:316 Y:553) When you approach the beach, you'll find an Entranced Child (a Tiefling boy) lured by the song of Harpy. Listen to the song and prepare to break away from it by choosing from a set of dialogues. If you succeed, you'll be able to break loose and help the child Tiefling snap out of the alluring song.
